TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRow/DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 将 的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体包括内置的辅助功能支持，使你的应用程序能够使用具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括屏幕弱视和审阅者实用程序、语音输入实用程序、屏幕键盘、备用输入设备和键盘增强实用程序。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 类从 类继承，以将有关的信息提供 给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 每个表示的可视部分的类 （如 、和） 也包含一个从继承的类， 以提供有关包含类的信息并代表具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序执行操作。Each class that represents a visual part of the - such as , , and - also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 在某些情况下，你将需要向 具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序提供附加信息（例如控件的名称或说明）。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 提供此附加信息的方法有两种。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要为现有控件提供有限的辅助功能信息，请设置控件的 和 属性值，这些值将报告给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 只应在极少数情况下更改和属性值，例如，如您所 示。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有时，你可能需要在自定义或中包含更多辅助功能信息或不同的可访问性操作 。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自定义可访问性，可以编写自己的类，该类派生自 或 类，并重写 方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 例如，如果您要编写一个自定义行标题单元格来实现独特的自定义操作（例如单元中的特殊命中测试），则应创建一个从类继承的类 并重写 方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 通过使用 值来定义数据表层次结构，从而公开其数据结构。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 有关向 Microsoft Active Accessibility 公开数据表的详细信息，请参阅 [通过 Microsoft Active Accessibility 公开数据表](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/dnacc/exposing-data-tables-through-microsoft-active-accessibility)。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see [Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/dnacc/exposing-data-tables-through-microsoft-active-accessibility).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了 方法将为每个值返回的 `navdir` 。The following table describes the that the method will return for each `navdir` value. |参数值Parameter value|返回值Return value| |---------------------|------------------| | 或 or |当前行下的辅助性对象 。An accessible object for the below the current row.| | 或 or |当前行之上的辅助性对象 。An accessible object for the above the current row.| ||行中第一个的辅助性对象 。An accessible object for the first in the row. 如果为，则为第一个单元格 `true` 。The is the first cell if is `true`.| ||行中最后一个可访问的对象 。An accessible object for the last in the row.| |所有其他 值All other values|`null`.`null`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Select(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection flags) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Select (flags As AccessibleSelection)

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 修改选择内容或移动辅助性对象的键盘焦点。

span.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了 方法将对每个值执行的操作 `flags` 。The following table describes the action that method will perform for each `flags` value. |参数值Parameter value|操作Action| |---------------------|------------| ||获得 焦点。The takes focus.| ||该行中的获得焦点。The in the row takes focus.| ||将 添加到 属性中。The is added to the property.| ||将 从属性中移除 。The is removed from the property.| 指定 值时，当前具有焦点的列与 将焦点放在当前中的单元格相同 。When you specify the value, the column of the that currently has focus is the same as the cell that will take focus in the current . 例如，如果第10行、第3单元格有焦点，且您为第15行指定了第15行， 则第15行的单元格将有焦点。For example, if row 10, cell 3 has focus, and you specify for row 15, then row 15, cell 3 will have focus. 如果中没有焦点，则该行中的第一个单元格将获得焦点 。The first cell in the row will take focus if no in the has focus.

span.span: The value of the property is .

value.span: 默认值为 和 值的按位组合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果选择了行中的所有对象，则该属性包含值 。The property includes the value if the all of the objects in the row are selected. 不指示行是否已滚动出视图。 does not indicate whether the row has scrolled out of view.

span.span: The value of the property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含 行中每个单元的属性。The property includes the property for each cell in the row. 如果当前行是新行，则返回字符串 " (创建新) "。 returns the string "(Create New)" if the current row is a new row.
